install.name: JWallpapers tag cloud module
install.author: Arunas Mazeika
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Arunas Mazeika - All rights reserved
install.description: A module to display tag clouds for accessing pictures that match a given tag

param.name: target_new_window
param.label: Show matching pictures in a new window ?
param.description: If set to Yes, thumbnails from pictures matching the selected tag will be displayed in a new window. Otherwise the view will be shown in the same window

param.name: tag_ordering
param.label: Tags ordering scheme
param.description: The tag ordering scheme used for the tag cloud

param.name: max_number_tags
param.label: Maximum number of tags
param.description: Provide the maximum number of tags that will be displyed in the tag cloud
